abstract: David Beckham is in the final months of his five-year contract with the Los Angeles Galaxy and Major League Soccer.
snippet: David Beckham is in the final months of his five-year contract with the Los Angeles Galaxy and Major League Soccer.
lead_paragraph: HOBOKEN, N.J. -- David Beckham may be 36 years old and nearing the end of a storied professional soccer career, but his often intangible appeal is still strong enough to attract interest from Europe.

headline.main: For Beckham, Family and Health Are No. 1 and 1A
